title: Mass & Weight Conversions (kg, lb, oz, N, kgf)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Mass (kg) → Pounds (lb): lb = kg × 2.20462262 Pounds (lb) → kg: kg = lb ÷ 2.20462262 Weight (N) → kgf: kgf = N ÷ 9.80665 kgf → N: N = kgf × 9.80665
